filesReadonlyListItemsInFolder.description: List the files and folders in a folder

maxSizeInBytes.description: Filter the items by maximum size (in bytes)

modifiedAfter.description: Filter the items modified after the given date

folderId.description: The folder's ID. This could be a unique identifier from the external service, or a relative or absolute path, so long as it's unique.

nextToken.description: The token to get the next page of items. Leave empty to get the first page.
